name: 陳怡靜
objective: This course is ONLY served to INTERNATIONAL students who are at Chinese INTERMEDIATE level. Exchange students are welcome to take it if it has vacancy. Students must be up to A2 level(HSK3~4) or more than 18 months studying experience (more than 660 studying hours). It would be better that your English ability has been achieved to B1 at least for communicating with your classmates and teacher. You need to cooperate with people who are from multiple culture.
